short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Points out failed translations in the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For every failed translation in a rails rendered webpage (using rails i18n locales), the extension will give you a count on the mini icon. 
On clicking that icon you will be able to see the failed translation text as well as path.
There is also a highlight button which upon clicking will add a small red border on the failed text

Contact: tcheck@manuraj.dev
